message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) as it deals with text summarization, which is a common task in NLP. Additionally, the use of reinforcement learning and reward functions is a popular approach in NLP research. 

It could also belong to the sub-category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) as reinforcement learning is a subfield of AI. 

The sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG) is also a possibility as the paper uses a machine learning approach (reinforcement learning) to improve the summarization task. 

Information Retrieval (cs.IR) is another possible sub-category as text summarization is often used in information retrieval systems to provide users with a quick overview of a large document. 

Finally, Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) is a less likely sub-category, but still possible as the paper may use neural networks as part of its approach to text summarization.
